title: Adani Energy inks pact to operate electricity transmission lines in Kenya
description: Gautam Adani's conglomerate has agreed to build and manage major electricity transmission lines in Kenya for 30 years. The project will upgrade Kenya's power infrastructure, addressing frequent blackouts. Funding will be sourced by Adani, and the government will not incur costs. After 30 years, the project will be transferred to Kenya's Electricity Transmission Company.
